comments:
Hi,

While I update my java project outside eclipse using lincvs,
eclipse reports message like "error to update workspace...",
even the project is closed.

Regards
Roger

Roger, can you please provide the .log file.

Pls see also
http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/%7Echeckout%7E/platform-text-home/development/bug-incomplete.htm

Created an attachment (id=16478)
My Eclipse Log File, Look at the End
Moving to core. Seems to be a problem in RefreshLocalVisitor

Here is the relevant stack trace from the log:

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Element not found:
